Package harrypotter

Class HPAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.matter.Action
      • harrypotter.HPAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionInterface, HPActionInterface, java.lang.Comparable<ActionInterface>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Move
    public abstract class HPAction
extends Action
implements HPActionInterface
    Base class for all intransitive commands/Actions in the harrypotter world. This class is an implementation of the HPActionInterface
    Author:
    ram
    See Also:
    Action, HPActionInterface

    • Method Detail

      • isMoveCommand

        public boolean isMoveCommand()
        Returns if or not this HPAction is a move command. By default, HPActions are not move commands hence this method will always return false.

        This method needs to be overridden in any HPAction is a move command (i.e. must be overridden to return true if the action can potentially change the location of a HPEntity or HPActor).

        Specified by:
        isMoveCommand in interface HPActionInterface
        Returns:
        false

      • execute

        public void execute​(Actor<?> a)
        Execute this HPAction by calling the act() method with an Actor a to perform the HPAction.

        This method acts as a wrapper for the act() method that downcasts its parameter to minimize dangerous downcasting in subclasses.

        This method only calls the act() method if and only,

        • The sub class of Actor a is a HPActor, and
        • The HPActor is not dead
        else this method does nothing.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface ActionInterface
        Specified by:
        execute in class Action
        Parameters:
        a - a sub class of Actor
        See Also:
        act(HPActor), HPActor.isDead()

        Description copied from interface: HPActionInterface
        The method that defines what needs to be performed when this action is performed.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
